title: Deadlock
description: This is the perfect action thriller for girls who don't want to let boys have all the fun. What if the right man for the job is actually a girl? Meet MI6's new recruit. Darcie Lock is on the run once again - and this time it's personal. Britain's most unlikely secret agent continues to evade the clutches of terrorists, governments and a typical teenage upbringing. In this her third adventure, Darcie Lock finds herself facing the dangers of a political summit. Amidst a host of world leaders Darcie is in for a nasty shock as she comes face to face with her arch-enemy Hugo - who has been recruited by MI6! Will she be able to fight shoulder to shoulder with the secret services, or will she have her to fight her corner yet again? The story is as thrilling as always, with some new faces and some old favourites too.
author: Julia Golding
